crosswordTipsPop.tip1: Open the Crossword Game and select your preferred difficulty level: easy, medium, hard, or impossible.
crosswordTipsPop.tip2: If the game allows, add words and their definitions using the Add Word.
crosswordTipsPop.tip3: Look at the clues provided in the CrosswordClue component. Each clue is associated with a number that corresponds to a specific location on the board.
crosswordTipsPop.tip4: Click on a cell in the crossword grid to start typing a word. The CrosswordCell component will handle your input.
